news.title: Nvidia stock turns positive in premarket trading as investors buy dip following earnings report
news.summary: Nvidia stock turned positive on Thursday after the chipmaker reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue for the fiscal second quarter. Nvidia stock turned negative on Thursday.

news.title: Lawyers for Susan Monarez say 'she remains as CDC Director', only Trump has power to 'fire her'
news.summary: White House says it fired Monarez after she refused to resign. The statement came hours after the White House said it had fired her for refusing to step down.

news.title: Dick's Sporting Goods raises guidance after second-quarter earnings beat
news.summary: Dick's Sporting Goods beat Wall Street's expectations on the top and bottom lines, leading it to raise its full year profit and sales guidance.

news.title: Best Buy reports modest sales recovery, but says tariffs are complicating its turnaround
news.summary: Best Buy surpassed revenue and earnings expectations for its most recent quarter. But the retailer stuck with its full-year forecast, citing tariff uncertainty.

news.title: Nvidia CEO Huang says bringing Blackwell AI chip to China 'is a real possibility'
news.summary: Huang predicted the artificial intelligence market in the world's second-biggest economy will grow 50% next year. Huang predicted the Artificial Intelligence Market in China will grow by 50% in 2014.

news.title: Dollar General says it’s getting the ‘value’ thing right. The stock is rallying.
news.summary: More people visited Dollar General stores during the latest quarter. More people also spent slightly more money when they shopped at Dollar General. More than half of those who shopped went to Dollar General at least once.

news.title: How Vanguard defends a super-conservative strategy that has proved surprisingly controversial
news.summary: Vanguard is now suggesting a portfolio that tilts heavily toward bonds over stocks. The money-management giant has a portfolio of more than $1 trillion in assets.

news.title: ‘Everyone was grieving’: Did my wife’s brothers cheat her out of her inheritance? There’s a condo and $550K at stake.
news.summary: “When my wife’s mom passed away, the eldest brother took on the role as executor,” he said.

news.title: ‘They knocked her down and started biting’: My mother, 84, was viciously attacked by her neighbor’s two dogs. Do we sue?
news.summary: "The police, ambulance and animal control were all called immediately. The dogs were removed and put down," police said. "The dogs were taken to a local animal shelter and the dogs were put down"

news.title: Why Trump’s business deals with Nvidia, Intel and other companies are really a tax on all of us
news.summary: Trump is putting the White House at the center of U.S. business. He’s also inventing novel ways to tax corporate America, consumers and employees.
